channel.title: The Return of ChronicFire
channel.description:
Hey,
ChronicFire has returned from the grave to bring you one of the most enjoyable Runescape private server experiences out there! We've all skills 100% working along with the Max and Completionist cape requirements and abilities. We have over 15 different bosses you can fight all around the world to obtain the most prestigious items known to Runescape. Our small community is rapidly growing everyday! Our professional staff are renown for their attitudes and dedication to the game and the community itself.
Come on in, we'd love to have you.
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://chronicfire.com/webclient"]Webclient[/URL] [CENTER][URL=http://"http://chronicfire.com/vote"]Vote4Reward![/URL][/CENTER] [URL=http://"http://chronicfire.com/download"]Download Client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://chronicfire.com"]Website[/URL][/CENTER]
Media:
[SIZE=4]Skilling:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/15t2IRj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VePw2VO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Uzn0Qdf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/z3iLng5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/s8dQ5pK.png[/img] [SIZE=4] Bossing/PVM[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zGrKUBj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qpCB8uh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BAgQPhY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bZ7z1NE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ikIpsWp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NsnRn9G.png[/img] [SIZE=4]Clan Wars[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NADROnT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8jVeaDm.png[/img] [SIZE=4]Home[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jbXmx88.png[/img] [SIZE=4]Nomad's Requiem[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/umh6S6I.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jcKhP3I.png[/img] [SIZE=4]LootShare[/SIZE] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cy4nCTT.png[/img] Friendly Staff! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gOfAv13.png[/img]
Hope to see you ingame!
~Andrew CEO & Head Developer of ChronicFire
